reviewText: We are a small church but wanted first class worship. This DVD lets us have it. Easy to use. Powerful graphics. We love it.

These worship DVD's are amazing!  We enjoy the worship music SOOOOO much with the beautiful scenery and the option to have lyrics or not.  If you are looking for worship music for church or bible study or just while you are doing other things around the house, these DVD's are awesome.

iWorship Resource DVD G Track Listing:

1. Ancient Words
2. Freedom
3. Friend of God
4. Save Us
5. There Is None Like You
6. Worthy Is the Lamb/Crown Him with Many Crowns
7. You Are Good
Amazon needs to list the songs on the DVD or CD.  You don't know what songs you are purchasing and you may already have it.  Not good!
